United Nations General Assembly Resolution 66/62 III, The Protocol on Prohibitions or Restrictions on the Use of Incendiary Weapons.
Shall we receive notifications when nations decide their vote on the current UN Resolution undergoing a vote?\nThese can be turned off at any time by an international decision.
UN Incendiary Weapons Convention Fails Vote
United Nations General Assembly Resolution 66/62 III, The Protocol on Prohibitions or Restrictions on the Use of Incendiary Weapons, has been defeated by vote in the United Nations General Assembly.
UN Incendiary Weapons Convention Passes Vote
United Nations General Assembly Resolution 66/62 III, The Protocol on Prohibitions or Restrictions on the Use of Incendiary Weapons, has passed its vote in the United Nations General Assembly.

We have the opportunity to vote on United Nations General Assembly Resolution 66/62 III, The Protocol on Prohibitions or Restrictions on the Use of Incendiary Weapons, at the UN General Assembly.\nWe can either vote For it, Abstain, or vote Against it.
We have ratified the UN Incendiary Weapons Convention.
Withdrawal from the Incendiary Weapons Convention
We have withdrawn from the UN Incendiary Weapons Convention.
